body.name: CariFree Maintenance Rinse (Citrus): Fluoride Mouthwash | Dentist Recommended Anti-Cavity Rinse | Xylitol | Neutralizes pH | Freshen Breath | Cavity Prevention | Alcohol Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: [WIN THE BATTLE AGAINST TOOTH DECAY]: Do you ever wonder why some of us continue to get cavities despite meticulous oral hygiene, whereas others who rarely brush and floss do not? The risk of cavities varies from person to person and is based on eating and drinking habits, hygiene (brushing and flossing), saliva flow, as well as other factors. *NEW LOOK, same great formula! Formally known as CariFree CTx3 Rinse*

[PROTECT YOUR SMILE]: CariFree Citrus Maintenance Rinse contains 0.05% sodium fluoride, which helps prevent tooth decay and white spots. Evidence shows that fluoride strengthens your teeth and aids in the prevention of dental cavities.

[NEUTRALIZE pH] Studies suggest that tooth decay is a function of low pH. Maintaining an elevated or neutral pH balance helps to keep your tooth enamel and smile healthy. CariFree Maintenance Rinse is alcohol-free and contains patented pH+ technology to elevate the pH in your mouth, keeping it balanced. U.S. Patent No. 9,427,384 & 10,143,633.

[FORMULATED WITH XYLITOL]: Maintenance Rinse contains 25% xylitol! Xylitol is a naturally occurring, sweet-tasting ingredient found in many types of plants. Research shows that regular use of xylitol-rich products may reduce your risk of dental cavities.

[DENTIST-RECOMMENDED MOUTHWASH] Maintaining proper dental hygiene and cavity prevention is essential to a happy and healthy smile! The dentist recommended Maintenance Rinse fluoride mouthwash actively works to prevent cavities, freshen breath, and elevate pH.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What Makes Us Different? Do you ever wonder why some people continue to get cavities despite meticulous oral hygiene, whereas others who rarely brush and floss do not? Can a person really be cavity-prone? An imbalance in your mouth causes cavities, and when dentists drill and fill cavities, they are only treating the result, not the imbalance itself—and the decay returns. For many, it's a frustrating, reactive approach to oral health, but not surprising. Until recently, dentists were taught that you'd be free of decay if you have good oral hygiene. The problem is that it's just not that simple. Break the cycle of decay with CariFree. CariFree's pH-elevated products fix the problem at its source. Safe to use every day, our non-abrasive products are highly effective and scientifically proven to prevent cavities. CariFree Maintenance Rinse CTx3 Rinse is one of CariFree's most popular products due to its great taste and fresh feeling. This scientifically proven formula contains cavity-fighting fluoride, xylitol, and an elevated pH. Maintenance Rinse is non-staining, alcohol-free, and recommended by dentists twice daily for ages 6+. For best results, we suggest pairing our Maintenance Rinse and CariFree Gel 1100 - rinsing first and brushing second so that the nano-hydroxyapatite in the gel remains on the teeth for additional protection.

Perfect For Patients with decay or high risk of decayLow/poor salivaBad breath (halitosis)Acidic dietMedication-induced xerostomia Product Benefits Long-term cavity preventionElevate pHMaintain a healthy smileAlcohol-freeNon-staining3 grams of xylitol per dose Available in mint, citrus, and grape! How To We recommend using our Maintenance Rinse along with the CariFree Gel 1100. For best results rinse first, brush second and wait 30 minutes before eating or drinking.

Protective Agents Elevated pH - Maintaining an elevated or neutral pH balance helps to keep your tooth enamel and smile healthy. Protective Agents Fluoride: Fluoride strengthens the teeth, while also making them less susceptible to demineralization. Protective Agents Xylitol: The xylitol in the Maintenance Rinse is a naturally occurring, sweet-tasting ingredient found in many types of plants. Research shows that regular use of xylitol-rich products may reduce your risk of dental cavities. Elevate pH Fluoride Xylitol

Ingredients Maintenance Rinse (Citrus) Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride 0.05% Inactive Ingredients: Natural and Artificial Flavors, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Water, Xylitol
Rinse First, Brush Second. Use twice daily Swish for 60 seconds with 10 mL CariFree Gel 1100 replaces your current toothpaste Brush twice daily with a pea-sized amount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it was recommended by my dentist. It is pretty big in size & I got the citrus flavor just to try something different. It actually tastes really sweet! And I realized id prefer a more minty flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent mouth wash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluoride, xylitol, doesn't taste like mint. 10/10
reviews.reviewText: Good for the teeth and saliva production.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice taste
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it has xylitol, which is supposed to be good for your teeth. The downside of this project is that it is too expensive although I did like the taste.
